channel.title: Cricket Injury on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in Cricket Injury on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Italy Captain Wayne Madsen Injures Shoulder in T20 World Cup Opener
item.description: Italy's Wayne Madsen suffers a shoulder injury during the T20 World Cup opener, raising concerns for the team's campaign.

item.title: Mahli Beardman Suffers Recurrence of a Stress Fracture in His Back
item.description: Mahli Beardman faces another setback as he suffers a stress fracture in his back, sidelining him from upcoming matches.
